summary: Water quality is stable but TDS is slightly elevated compared to the 7-day average.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH around 6.8-7.2 for optimal tilapia and plant growth.
Consider diluting with fresh water to lower TDS closer to the 7-day average.
Monitor temperature; ensure it stays below 30°C to prevent stress on tilapia.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.056 / 7.025 / 7.073 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 309.727 / 295.8 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 27.949 / 27.25 / 29.25 °C (trend: up)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
